page.title: 15EVENTS
page.content: The fete is in the Summer so that old people can come - it will be warm for them. There is a fancy dress parade and one year I went as a hula girl. I came fourth and won 2O pence. One of our teachers served at the cake stall near the door. There was a big refreshment stall in the hall and a big toy stall too. One year we bought a sledge from the stall. There are book stalls, comic stalls and a raffle. One year I won a tin of pear-halves and I had them for my tea when I got home that day. We have an Army assault course and I made it on my own without any help from the Cadets who are there to help you and they gave me a clap. It was fun on the Army assault course because there are lots of things to do. One of the fathers was selling balloons with gas in them for fifty pence. I bought one.
